document_data.name: Chessentan Lotus Cheese
document_data.mainbody: '''Chessentan Lotus Cheese'''  was a popular cheese crafted in [[Chessenta]]. It was also sold through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]].
document_data.Description: This novelty cheese was mixed with petals from many flowers before the Chessentans finally settled on [[lotus]] for its exotic qualities. It was particularly popular among the [[Old Empires]], not only in Chessenta but in [[Mulhorand]] and [[Unther]] as well.
document_data.Prices:
Chessentan Lotus cheese could be purchased in the following sizes:
* Wheel, {{SI|1|lb|k}}, 6 [[sp]]
* Circular Whey, {{SI|100|lb|k}}, 55 [[gp]]
